column1: We all have a role to play to defend freedom faith and family.  It’s 2020!!  Join the campaign to make a difference. Join us here. https://t.co/LTluBZFB2C https://t.co/mRbxrbLBxP
Thank you for visiting my campaign Twitter page. If you are looking for my official House of Representatives Twitter page please click here: https://t.co/ciacZDcc4i
Scene from New Years... From the Cloud family Wishing you and yours all the best in 2020 ‼️🎉 https://t.co/8bEnltHW3M
Merry Christmas with love from the Cloud family. #Christmas https://t.co/xfoLw4C3Ba

Last week impeachment articles passed out of committee by a partisan vote following a tainted process designed to manage a preset narrative. Rules have continually been ignored — including my and others request for a minority hearing.  https://t.co/etnKHEKJ1k

I believe life begins at conception and will continue to work to ensure each child is given the opportunity to experience the most basic of rights — the right to life.   Proud to have @TXAlliance4Life’s endorsement for 2020. #prolife https://t.co/WoXO74nGqY

“It is the duty of all Nations to acknowledge the providence of Almighty God to obey his will to be grateful for his benefits and humbly to implore his protection and favor..” -Pres. Washington   “Give thanks to the Lord for he is good; his love endures forever.” Psalms 107:1 https://t.co/I179KeGrxG

Recently I had the opportunity to be interviewed on the @Shalemag podcast talking about innovation entrepreneurship our victories together for our ports and the importance of what America has done in energy independence.   Click here to listen:  https://t.co/2t3yqbLR92

This week I was endorsed by Texans for Fiscal Responsibility as one of their 2020 Pro-Taxpayer Team in Washington DC.  I told you when I ran for Congress that I would stand up for you - the TAXPAYER. We continue the fight for fiscal responsibility in our federal government. https://t.co/0AS4oTNjST
Join the Cloud campaign as we say goodbye to 2019 and get ready for 2020.  To RSVP or more information contact Bunni at 972-922-0022 or bunni@cloudforcongress.com https://t.co/WMI7tO06Hm
Today we honor those who have served our great nation.   We owe these American heroes an unpayable debt of gratitude.   #veteransday #Wewillremember https://t.co/aptJSDcItM

Join Congressman Cloud and family in supporting our Veterans on November 11th in Victoria as we celebrate our national heroes together. Email bunni@cloudforcongress.com to volunteer. https://t.co/9v7xrmubdf

Today is Election Day! Polls are open till 7 pm.   You can see where your polling place is on your county Elections Department website.   This is important for Texas. Thank you for voting! #electionday2019 https://t.co/PhyRTjoRVI

When Obamacare was passed Americans were promised that they would not be paying for anyone else's abortion. That promise was not kept in the rules that followed. It is time that we fix this hidden abortion charge. #Prolife   https://t.co/s98f6dvRt0

What is happening in Washington is not just a battle for the world but for the soul of our nation.   Great to be with friends from SD 18 this last Saturday as we talked about the courage needed to face our nation’s challenges - both in Washington and here at home. https://t.co/Ur1YgrrPyu

What an honor to be recognized by my own community as the 2019 Victoria County Republican of the Year. I turned around and gave it to Rosel for faithfully serving by my side. Thank you so much friends. It’s a privilege to serve with you. It is a night I will not soon forget. https://t.co/xFcwirTh6j

Thank you for your support then and now.   The work continues together for: The protection of the unborn Fiscal responsibility  Border security  Good governance Defending religious liberty  Protecting our 2nd amendment rights  and so much more https://t.co/aoIKp9Dtba

Even though I wasn’t able to be at the @TFRW’s convention in Galveston I sent @bunnipounds my campaign manager with gifts to bless the women who do so much for the cause. Thank you ladies for all your hard work. https://t.co/HqfwAvfeZd

140 people took a stand at the Battle of Gonzales on this day 184 years ago. Today we must take our stand for the first principles of our country. Let’s remember their courage and pray for our own. https://t.co/mqmTn7NpNU

Thankful for all the supporters and friends who got us this far and who will continue to work to defend faith family and freedom.   Appreciate Congressman @MarkMeadows coming to town (all the way from North Carolina) to remind us of the important principles at stake. https://t.co/96CrhyVcof
Celebrating with our Jewish friends today - Happy New Year! May this next year be sweet and fulfilling for all. #RoshHashanah https://t.co/ii6dOElrzp

Today is National Voter Registration Day!   Will you connect with us as we work with our local GOP parties to register voters for the rest of 2019 and into 2020? We will connect you and put you to work.   Volunteer here: https://t.co/LTluBZFB2C https://t.co/8lfXbujxT6

We want to see YOU! Texas is ground zero in 2020.   Check out all of our events this coming Saturday and next week in Victoria Corpus Christi Edna and Yoakum.   Register today at https://t.co/lq1XqcHjZt https://t.co/xErGRkYW8k
Got to hang out with Bob Jones in the studio in Corpus Christi talking about everything we did during the August “recess”. If you missed it check it out.   https://t.co/jHFyCTd5Oc
It is an honor to serve the people of TX-27 & the people of Texas.   Article here: https://t.co/hMlzAT8YOJ https://t.co/JCMb8toTSH

Join us for our fall campaign event on October 1st with Rev. Rafael Cruz (Father of U.S. Senator Ted Cruz) in #CorpusChristi as we prepare for 2020 together. https://t.co/lq1XqcHjZt https://t.co/uO5Gj1m6BN

Rosel was here with me in DC this week.   This morning Rosel joined other Congressional spouses and  @the_USO to prepare care packages for our troops stationed abroad.   Thankful for USO for all they do to support our men and women in uniform. https://t.co/xOLrEt6wVr

We will never forget the lives that were lost and how Americans everywhere joined together in response. Let's remember the lessons learned and never forget the fallen. #NeverForget #September11 https://t.co/hp1W0oq2Iy
Join us for our fall campaign event on September 28th with Congressman @MarkMeadows (Chairman of the House Freedom Caucus) in VICTORIA as we prepare for 2020 together. https://t.co/9N4WMtXPje
When I go back to the U.S. Capitol soon the crisis at the border will continue to be at the top of my list of priorities to push Congress to fix. #EndtheBorderCrisis https://t.co/to5MSEQtVc

No work is insignificant. Created by God it gives all of us a sense of accomplishment and purpose.   Today we enjoy our families and friends and thank God for a nation that provides a great environment for work and freedom. #happylaborday https://t.co/mrV2a2LjKv

It was an honor that my story was covered in detail as the cover article in @Shalemag.   You can read the full article here: https://t.co/hMlzAT8YOJ  Thank you for allowing me to serve you! https://t.co/q99UKGZFYE

Celebrating 20 years of marriage with Rosel!  So grateful for 20 years of sacrifice encouragement commitment through good and challenging times and the joy of a life and family built together by God’s grace.  You are my friend my partner my love.  I love doing life with you. https://t.co/3tus1SDJua

From @FreedomWorks: "During his first term in Congress Rep. Michael Cloud has demonstrated the tenacity and principled legislating that is far too uncommon in our nation’s capital.... We are proud to name him as our Member of the month for August 2019."   https://t.co/dqFbPvZzmQ

This last week it was so great to be back in TEXAS with common sense people who understand the issues that are facing our nation.   From Refugio County to Wharton County to Aransas County we thanked supporters for helping our campaign. Thank you friends! https://t.co/lBoXWPOJiJ

Stayed a day after votes last week to make up for some missed time with Kent.  I always say DC is a great place TO VISIT. 😉     Love this kiddo.  Great having Kent with me in DC  for committee meetings votes and  all...   and some fun!!  But happy to be back in Texas!! https://t.co/UryiGORgm9

I joined with 33 of my colleagues to ask @SpeakerPelosi to keep Congress in session until we provide adequate funding for our men and women of ICE and regain operational control of our southern border.   #BorderCrisis #bordersecurity   https://t.co/KRsCzoVjbQ

.@FreedomWorks just released their beginning scores for Congress this year and I am proud to be a Texas Congressional Champion with a 100% voting record.   When I went to Washington I told you that I would work to restore constitutional conservative leadership.   Thank you! https://t.co/GI7lsDUOtJ

As part of the Science Space and Technology committee I am working to ensure that America continues to lead in space exploration and that we have an environment where American innovation continues to thrive.   Great commentary by @KayColesJames here.   https://t.co/hHgQ5LUYvw

The glory of the American Revolution wasn’t that we had a great Government but that we had a free people!  From our family to yours we wish you all the best as we celebrate Independence Day!    #IndependenceDay #HappyBirthdayAmerica #4thofJuly #GodblessAmerica https://t.co/VxRkpjf9Wn

Last night we celebrated the one year anniversary of winning the special election!  So many worked so hard for seemingly months on end to restore representation to our district.    I take the responsibility seriously and am grateful for your prayers and support! https://t.co/A6dAy2JrtV
Today is the last day to help our campaign before the end of the quarter.   Will you join with us? Will you join Team Cloud? Every dollar helps.   https://t.co/okiFflt96Q https://t.co/JRBqHglo6Z
We only have three more days till our quarter fundraising deadline.   Will you help us protect FREEDOM FAITH and FAMILY?   https://t.co/okiFflt96Q https://t.co/GMwtHTQ4F4

We need to elect principled constitutional conservatives at every level of government.   We need more VOTERS for our cause than ever before. Help us register Texas voters throughout TX-27.   Sign up to join our team: https://t.co/LTluBZFB2C https://t.co/30sfLyl1sW

This situation on the border is unsustainable. Our border patrol agents are overwhelmed and need more infrastructure technology and manpower to confront and deal with the cartels. Listen to my full interview here: https://t.co/3iQYKBqpm6 https://t.co/zCI6RpJ489
My kids make me smile laugh and make me thankful for my life and family. The greatest privilege and priority of my life is to be their dad. Happy Father's Day! https://t.co/w9cAf4f57Y

Let's celebrate our beautiful flag today. Read the history here: https://t.co/DUcKx5fJTK  And congratulations to the U.S. Army on their 244th birthday as well. Our armed services protect our lives and our flag. We are so thankful.   Happy #FlagDay! #HonortheUSFlag #ArmyBirthday https://t.co/gu37ndh3YC

Today we honor the Americans who died to uphold our liberties 75 years ago.   Let’s recommit our hearts to protect the freedom of the next generation of Americans.   #DDaylanding #dd75 https://t.co/d20oeeWRFe

There is no end in sight right now to the situation on our southern border. Drugs and human trafficking continue to surge across overwhelming our border patrol resources.   I joined Hector Garza of the National Border Patrol Council on the border.   https://t.co/IO3GSr4qRM
Had a blast throwing the first pitch at the Victoria Generals game last night. Nothing more American than community and baseball. https://t.co/RpvlyRDUuC
Today we remember those who paid the ultimate price for our great nation. We owe them everything.   #MemorialDay2019 #MemorialDay https://t.co/rQZjDerND9

If you had told me a year ago that Anti-Semitism would be a major discussion point when I went to Congress I don't know if I would have believed you but it has reared its ugly head. We must be vigilant against it - to defeat it here at home and abroad.  https://t.co/kjEWD8CZJr
We need to hold to the spending caps. The federal government needs to budget like every American family. https://t.co/QGwdEH3sPr
Texans know Texas land better than any bureaucracy or Washington agency. Property & water rights for every farmer & rancher in TX-27 must be protected. https://t.co/6BIYSy01w8

Every building has a foundation.   The foundation of this campaign has always been "We the People" and us working together.   I would love to have you as part of the monthly foundation for our campaign.   See the details here: https://t.co/PunHa8vXS4 https://t.co/I1flEX71Rf

I signed onto a letter with @chiproytx (TX-21) & others to ask House Speaker Nancy Pelosi to present a budget plan that does not break through the spending caps enacted by the Budget Control Act of 2011. https://t.co/FhMGeSYshI

Some people say I have a hard job but my wife has the really tough job. She is my hero. Thankful for the love of my life Rosel on this Mother's Day.  And thanks to all the moms who give of themselves everyday. You make the world a better place.   #MothersDay #SuperMom https://t.co/AASkuddijU

In honor of all military spouses on #MilitarySpouseAppreciationDay here's a song by Corpus Christi resident Lauren Leiter who's married to a U.S. Coast Guard pilot.   Thank you to all of our nation's military spouses for your sacrifices.   https://t.co/Nx9gEvXrjm

A perfect Texas evening in Jackson County! Grateful for so many new friends & supporters who came out tonight. Thank you to Lindsey Lee & Dr. Mac and Carol Lee for hosting a campaign event that I will not soon forget. Rosel & I were so blessed by the kind words and encouragement. https://t.co/8Q4V0u8WmF

Great to see so many friends and community members out at the Warrior's Weekend Field of Honor.  It’s so important we honor those who have served in our nation’s armed forces and pass on a heart of gratitude to the next generation. https://t.co/9O9VHVxUUi
Local Elections Matter!!  Don’t forget to vote in your local municipal elections today! #VoteLocal #maythe4thbewithyou https://t.co/FNoh3KPbTH

Made it back to Texas in time to celebrate this wonderful woman’s birthday with some fun family time. So grateful for you Rosel!  You’re such an amazing person. Blessed to know you and privileged to do life with you. Happy Birthday my love!   She also won the round of mini-golf. https://t.co/inETZ8hiNp

It’s been great to be able to spend time in Texas!!  We had a very active schedule on the campaign side over the last few weeks. So thankful for all of our supporters from Calhoun County Matagorda County Nueces County and Victoria County who came out to join us. https://t.co/yZElFJ1eRb
